tests.name: At the start of a round the global variable power is 0
At the start of a round Snowball has coordinates (-200, -130)
At the start of a round Snowball has direction 90
At the start of a round Snowball has costume 'snowball-aim'
At the start of a round Snowball is visible
Until mouse is down Snowball points towards the mouse pointer
While mouse is down and while power is less than 20 the direction of Snowball points towards the mouse pointer
While mouse is down and while power is less than 20 power increases by 1
After mouse is released Snowball switches to costume 'snowball'
Until Snowball touches the edge of the stage or Rocks the y coordinate is changed by -5
Until Snowball touches the edge of the stage or Rocks Snowball moves power steps
After moving power steps power is decreased by 0.25
After Snowball touches the edge of the stage or Rocks it gets invisible
After Snowball touches the edge of the stage or Rocks a new round starts
At the start of a round Reindeer goes to a random x coordinate between 0 and 200
If Snowball touches Reindeer, Reindeer says 'You got me!' for 2 seconds
